message.entry: Input matrix must not contain NaN or Inf values.
Input array must be 2-dimensional. Use PAGEEIG to calculate eigenvalues and eigenvectors of each page of an N-D array.
For standard eigenproblem, option must be "vector", "matrix", "balance", or "nobalance".
Invalid option combination. Each option ("vector"/"matrix" and "balance"/"nobalance") can be specified only once.
Invalid data type. Input matrix must be double or single.
Invalid data type. Input matrices must be double or single.
For generalized eigenproblem, input matrices must be the same size.
For generalized eigenproblem, option must be "vector", "matrix", "qz", or "chol".
Invalid option combination. Each option ("vector"/"matrix" and "qz"/"chol") can be specified only once.
Input matrix must be real and symmetric when matrix is sparse. Use eigs to compute a subset of eigenvectors and eigenvalues of a sparse matrix.
Too many output arguments. Only one output argument is supported when the input matrix is sparse. Use eigs to compute a subset of eigenvectors and eigenvalues of a sparse matrix.
Sparse matrices not supported for generalized eigenproblem. Use eigs to compute a subset of eigenvectors and eigenvalues of a sparse eigenproblem.
